forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
